player.name: Isiah Thomas
player.physicalDescription: smaller 6'1" guard, compact powerful build, bright smile that masked killer instinct, dark skin, baby-faced but fierce
player.archetype: The Baby-Faced Assassin, led the Bad Boys, ruled through intimidation

figure.name: Pharaoh
figure.attributeDescription: golden crook (heka) and flail (nekhakha), the royal symbols of Egyptian absolute power
figure.visualStyle: ancient Egyptian king, absolute ruler, oppressor of Israel
figure.clothing: elaborate royal Egyptian regalia: white linen kilt (shendyt), golden collar (usekh), double crown of Upper and Lower Egypt (pschent), golden sandals
figure.physicalDescription: regal imperious bearing, clean-shaven head, dark kohl-lined eyes, strong jaw, olive to brown skin, face of absolute authority and cruelty
figure.anatomyNote: two arms only, holding crook and flail crossed
figure.archetype: The Tyrant King, hardened his heart, ruled with iron fist

connection.thematic: Both ruled their domains with an iron fist and showed no mercy to opponents
connection.narrative: Pharaoh hardened his heart. Isiah and the Bad Boys hardened their elbows. Let my people go? Never.
connection.relationship: Ruthless rulers who tormented anyone who challenged them

interactions.description: Two rulers surveying their domain, daring anyone to challenge them
Standing as tyrants, unmoved and unforgiving
